name: Log Manager
short_desc: Centralized log management with OpenSearch and Fluent Bit
author: OpenSearch Project
description: A comprehensive log management solution featuring OpenSearch for search and analytics, OpenSearch Dashboards for visualization, and Fluent Bit for log collection and forwarding. Perfect for centralizing logs from multiple sources including Docker containers, system logs, and network devices.

form_fields.label: Disable Security Plugin
form_fields.hint: Disable OpenSearch security plugin for simplified setup (not recommended for production)
